actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, to provide that certain recapture provisions shall not apply in the case of the liquidation of certain corporations wholly owned by a municipal corporation.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code, that specified recapture provisions shall not apply in the case of the liquidation of corporations wholly owned by a municipal corporation. (Adds 26 U.S.C. 1245(b)(7))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, to provide that certain recapture provisions shall not apply in the case of the liquidation of certain corporations wholly owned by a municipal corporation.
